other_tests.findings: Dissociation between very low LH and normal or nearly normal FSH levels, with gonadotropin responding excessively to the GnRH challenge test.
Restored pulsatile LH secretion, normalized circulating testosterone levels, and ovulation in one female patient.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased gonadotropin and estradiol levels were detected post-treatment, and appropriate endometrial thickening occurred.

other_tests.findings: Normal sense of smell in all patients.
Normal MRI in all evaluated patients.
In one patient, revealed small ovaries and a small uterus.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up after treatment showed normal reproductive function and outcomes.

other_tests.findings: Very low testosterone and LH levels, with FSH in the normal range.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-treatment hormonal levels normalized, with increased testosterone and LH.
